markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Downtime](/Traits.aspx?ID=49)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

An activity with this trait takes a day or more, and can be used only during downtime.
name: Downtime
